QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Niacin for cholesterol
QAPair.Answer: Niacin is a B-vitamin. When taken as a prescription in larger doses, it can help lower cholesterol and other fats in your blood. Niacin helps: Raise HDL (good) cholesterol , Lower LDL (bad) cholesterol, Lower triglycerides , another type of fat in your blood , Niacin works by blocking how your liver makes cholesterol. Cholesterol can stick to the walls of your arteries and narrow or block them.
